## Overview

Access Norwegian and international development aid data for internal use in Norad.

-   read\_\* functions for importing data into R as a tibble data frame

-   access\_\* functions for using a remote tibble data frame linked to a database table

-   add_cols\_\* functions for add columns to tibble data frames

## Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
remotes::install_github("noradno/noradstats", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Examples

```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(noradstats)
```
